stories.text:
Most registrars offer a registrar lock, which prevents the transfer of a domain.

But how to actually enable registry lock, at Verisign level for .com domains? Verisign's page about this doesn't explain how to actually do it.

Have you ever done it?
stories.title: Ask HN: Have you ever enabled a domain name registry lock?
Likely cause of Alzheimer’s identified in new study
Zeus Living closes on $55M, expands beyond corporate housing
10k John Deere workers on strike after rejecting contract

stories.text:
Hello, I want to build a SaaS landing page to know if there is any online traction. I would like to build it quickly and iterate easily.

I'm a tech guy so if I was only listening to myself I would build it 100% with code but my gut feeling is saying that this is wrong.

So what would you suggest, and why?

- 100% code from scratch

- Code but using a template

- Mixed between code and no code

- 100% No code

- Other?

Thank you :)
stories.title: Ask HN: What tool do you use to build a landing page?
Configuration is an API, not an SDK – README.txt
